hero.subtitle: At CIDEACC, a division of the Clínica de la Costa Clinical Research Center founded in 2022, we lead the integration of artificial intelligence in healthcare to improve medical attention, diagnosis, and disease treatment. Our purpose is to revolutionize medicine through research and the development of innovative solutions, positively impacting people's quality of life.

features.title: Pioneering Medical AI
features.subtitle: We integrate applied research, software development, and talent training to create cutting-edge AI solutions that improve patient care and operational efficiency.

ai.title: Generative AI
ai.description: Structuring medical data, generating clinical summaries, and enabling interactive consultations.

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.description: Reducing operational times, improving access to critical information, and empowering medical staff.

innovation.title: Applied Innovation
innovation.description: Developing local, open-source solutions to ensure total data privacy and security.

cta_section.title: Ready to Revolutionize Healthcare Together?
cta_section.subtitle: Join us in our mission to bring the future of medicine to the present.

about.title: About CIDEACC
about.subtitle: Medical AI Laboratory of Clínica de la Costa.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To digitally transform the institution through state-of-the-art AI tools, integrating applied research, software development, and talent training.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be leaders in the application of artificial intelligence in the medical field, improving the quality of life of our patients and the efficiency of our clinical processes.

history.title: Project History
history.text: CIDEACC was born from the need to modernize and optimize clinical processes at Clínica de la Costa. Since our inception, we have focused on developing practical and secure AI solutions that directly address the challenges of our medical staff, promoting a culture of continuous innovation.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Generative AI to empower medical professionals.
solutions.description: CIDEACC has developed a comprehensive Generative AI solution designed to address the core challenges of modern healthcare data management. Our system is built locally with open-source models, ensuring total privacy and control over sensitive information.

data_structuring.title: Unstructured Data Processing
data_structuring.description: We transform free text, PDFs, and audio recordings into structured, usable medical data, eliminating manual data entry.

summarization.title: Automatic Clinical Summaries
summarization.description: Our AI generates concise and accurate clinical summaries, saving physicians valuable time.

interactive_consultation.title: Interactive Chat Interface
interactive_consultation.description: Physicians can interact with patient data through a chat interface, asking complex questions and receiving instant answers.

agentic_rag.title: Specialized Agents & Agentic RAG
agentic_rag.description: We use advanced techniques like Agentic RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) with specialized agents for highly accurate and context-aware responses.

list.time_reduction: Drastic reduction in transcription and data review time.
list.efficiency: Increased medical efficiency and better decision-making.
list.copilots: Creation of clinical copilots that assist staff in their daily tasks.
list.privacy: Total privacy and security by using local, open-source models.

impact.title: Impact and Learnings
impact.subtitle: Measurable results and key insights from our projects.

ai_summary.title: Generate AI-Powered Summary
ai_summary.description: Enter an overview of CIDEACC's projects and initiatives below to generate a concise summary of their key impacts and learnings. This tool uses AI to distill the most important outcomes.
ai_summary.placeholder: Provide an overview of the projects...

items.time_reduction: Reduction in operational times for clinical data review.
items.accessibility: Improved accessibility to critical information for decision-making.
items.empowerment: Empowerment of medical and administrative staff with intelligent tools.

items.no_generic: Avoid generic solutions: AI must be tailored to specific clinical needs.
items.measure_accuracy: The importance of rigorously measuring the accuracy and utility of AI models.
items.gradual_progress: Gradual progress with well-aligned AI generates more value and adoption than disruptive but poorly integrated solutions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to help. Send us a message or contact us directly.

form.name: Full Name
form.success_description: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you shortly.
form.error_description: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Digitally transforming healthcare with innovative and secure AI solutions.
